com.rift.coad.daemon.messageservice
Interface Producer

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
public interface Producer
extends java.rmi.Remote

The producer is responsible for creating and sending message for a single client. It is a session based RMI object.

Method Summary
 RPCMessage createRPCMessage(int type)
          This method is responsible for creating a new RPC message for the message service.
 TextMessage createTextMessage(int type)
          This method is responsible for creating a new text message for the message service.
 void submit(Message newMessage)
          This method is responsible for submitting a new message for processing by the message service.
